```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
  opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r cop}
methane <- read.csv("COP_CH4_Obs_Mod_Bg_Sep2012-Aug2013.csv")
spring.months <- c("3", "4", "5")
spring <- methane %>% filter(Mn %in% spring.months)
summer.months <- c("6", "7", "8")
summer <- methane %>% filter(Mn %in% summer.months)
fall.months <- c("9", "10", "11")
fall <- methane %>% filter(Mn %in% fall.months)
winter.months <- c("12", "1", "2")
winter <- methane %>% filter(Mn %in% winter.months)
```
